question: Please can you tell me the meaning of the name Uwais and Uzair. Are they good names to give to children (boys).Shukran Zaheera
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Uways: a dimunitive form of the word, 'Aws' meaning a gift, present, etc.

Uzayr (Arabic) derived from Ta'zeer meaning to assist, support, etc.
(al-Busooruz Zaahira pg.135; Darul Kitaab)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Bilaal Cassim
